title: Watch Face - SX10
summary: Clean, simple and minimalist Watch Face. You can choose your favorite color.
description: SX10 Watch Face minimal, clearly visible with a digital clock.You can choose your favorite color. Just slide your finger over the slider.This Watch Face works on watches with round and square display – for Android Wear OS. Features of SX10 Watch Face : ★ Very readable watch face★ Digital Clock★ Day of week★ Day of month★ Battery Level★ Ambient Mode (Always On)★ Choose color and saturation by the slider★ 4 (green, red, yellow, blue) color presets Compatibile with:- Motorola 360 - Moto 360 2015 - Moto 360 Sports- Huawei Watch- Casio WSD-F10- LG G Watch R- LG G Watch- TAG Heuer- Fossil Q- Samsung Gear Live- Asus ZenWatch (1 & 2)- Sony Smartwatch 3   (NOT for Samsung Gear S2  - Tizen OS) How to Use Watch Face:Install the application on your smartphone (paired). SX10 Watch Face will be automatically installed on your watch (this may take a few minutes).Please feel free to contact me if you have any issues or questions (e-mail). Thanks!
descriptionHTML:
SX10 Watch Face minimal, clearly visible with a digital clock.

You can choose your favorite color. Just slide your finger over the slider.

This Watch Face works on watches with round and square display – for Android Wear OS.


Features of SX10 Watch Face :

★ Very readable watch face
★ Digital Clock
★ Day of week
★ Day of month
★ Battery Level
★ Ambient Mode (Always On)
★ Choose color and saturation by the slider
★ 4 (green, red, yellow, blue) color presets


Compatibile with:

- Motorola 360
- Moto 360 2015
- Moto 360 Sports
- Huawei Watch
- Casio WSD-F10
- LG G Watch R
- LG G Watch
- TAG Heuer
- Fossil Q
- Samsung Gear Live
- Asus ZenWatch (1 & 2)
- Sony Smartwatch 3


(NOT for Samsung Gear S2 - Tizen OS)


How to Use Watch Face:

Install the application on your smartphone (paired). SX10 Watch Face will be automatically installed on your watch (this may take a few minutes).

Please feel free to contact me if you have any issues or questions (e-mail). Thanks!
comments: Nice face, but Will not sync with watch, any ideas? UPDATE 9/26...found my problem, works fine and looks great...
Not sure what it does? Just sits there.nothing fancy like showing up when I darken my phone. Hope nobody paid for this.
Advice: Add a smooth moving seconds hand in next update.  Rest the app is awesome!!

It's elegant and perfect and simple and.... Can't describe it enough...just that I love it. One question can you update the time to 12 hours for digital? Also I noticed a glitch...sometimes the hands are an hour behind
Beautiful Such a simple yet gorgeous watch face. I love it!!
